If you want to change the context of the current cluster or class in the diagram, click the Select depth of relations button.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_select_depth_color.gif
The Context dialog appears. The layout depends on whether the current context is one of a class or cluster.
Context is a class:
/images/eiffelstudio/dialogs_and_wizards/context-dialog-class.png
Context is a cluster:
